PageWidgetPortable.Title: Perspectivas
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <SimpleGridAttributes> <CanDelete>false</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>false</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>false</CanInsert> <EntityViewName>INDICADOR_DESEMPENHO_PERSPECTIVAS_MAPA_ESTRATEGICO.DATASOURCE.GRID</EntityViewName> <Mode>0</Mode> <UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible>false</UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible> <UserDefinedPageSize>100</UserDefinedPageSize> <SystemFilterOnly>false</SystemFilterOnly> <DisplayRowCommand>true</DisplayRowCommand> <CompanyFilterMode>0</CompanyFilterMode> <UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause>@CONDICAO('PLANEJAMENTOESTRATEGICO', 'IGUAL', PLANEJAMENTO) AND (@CONDICAO('CICLO', 'IGUAL', CICLO) OR CICLO IS NULL) AND @CONDICAO('PERSPECTIVA', 'IGUAL', PERSPECTIVA)</UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause> <ShowExport>true</ShowExport> <UserDefinedDisableRowSelection>false</UserDefinedDisableRowSelection> </SimpleGridAttributes>

PageWidgetPortable.Title: Objetivos
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <SimpleGridAttributes> <CanDelete>false</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>false</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>false</CanInsert> <EntityViewName>INDICADOR_DESEMPENHO_OBJETIVOS_MAPA_ESTRATEGICO.DATASOURCE.GRID</EntityViewName> <Mode>0</Mode> <UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible>false</UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible> <UserDefinedPageSize>100</UserDefinedPageSize> <SystemFilterOnly>false</SystemFilterOnly> <DisplayRowCommand>true</DisplayRowCommand> <CompanyFilterMode>0</CompanyFilterMode> <UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause>@CONDICAO('PLANEJAMENTOESTRATEGICO', 'IGUAL', PLANEJAMENTO) AND @CONDICAO('CICLO', 'IGUAL', CICLO) AND @CONDICAO('PERSPECTIVA', 'IGUAL', PERSPECTIVA) AND @CONDICAO('HANDLE', IGUAL, OBJETIVO)</UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause> <ShowExport>true</ShowExport> <UserDefinedDisableRowSelection>false</UserDefinedDisableRowSelection> </SimpleGridAttributes>

PageWidgetPortable.Title: Indicadores
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <SimpleGridAttributes> <CanDelete>false</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>false</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>false</CanInsert> <EntityViewName>INDICADOR_DESEMPENHO_INDICADORES_MAPA_ESTRATEGICO.DATASOURCE.GRID</EntityViewName> <Mode>0</Mode> <UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible>false</UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible> <UserDefinedPageSize>100</UserDefinedPageSize> <SystemFilterOnly>false</SystemFilterOnly> <DisplayRowCommand>true</DisplayRowCommand> <CompanyFilterMode>0</CompanyFilterMode> <UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause>@CONDICAO('PLANEJAMENTOESTRATEGICO', 'IGUAL', PLANEJAMENTO) AND @CONDICAO('CICLO', 'IGUAL', CICLO) AND @CONDICAO('PERSPECTIVA', 'IGUAL', PERSPECTIVA) AND @CONDICAO('OBJETIVO', 'IGUAL', OBJETIVO) </UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause> <ShowExport>true</ShowExport> <UserDefinedDisableRowSelection>false</UserDefinedDisableRowSelection> </SimpleGridAttributes>
